selectedVerses.text: Thus says the LORD to his anointed, to Cyrus, whose right hand I have grasped, to subdue nations before him and to loose the belts of kings, to open doors before him that gates may not be closed:
wearing belts on their waists, with flowing turbans on their heads, all of them having the appearance of officers, a likeness of Babylonians whose native land was Chaldea.
Acquire no gold nor silver nor copper for your belts,
He charged them to take nothing for their journey except a staff--no bread, no bag, no money in their belts--
